headline: Ameriprise Attracts Advisor with More Than $120 Million in Assets for Sophisticated Solutions and Financial Planning Capabilities
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, August 07, 2025--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) announced today that financial advisor Vince Abio has joined S&T Financial Services, a financial advisory practice within the Ameriprise Financial Institutions Group (AFIG) located in Chester, Pa. The 28-year industry veteran was previously with Merrill Lynch where he managed more than $120 million in client assets.
